PSCT.Base: You can reveal 1 other "P.U.N.K." monster in your hand; Special Summon either the revealed monster or this card, and send the other to the GY. If this card is sent from the field to your GY: You can target 1 "P.U.N.K." monster in your GY, except a Level 5 monster; Special Summon it, but you cannot Special Summon "Noh-P.U.N.K. Deer Note" for the rest of this turn. You can only use each effect of "Noh-P.U.N.K. Deer Note" once per turn.
